item.title: Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes loses fraud appeal
item.description: Holmes was sentenced to more than 11 years in prison for defrauding investors in her blood-testing company.

item.title: Venezuelan opposition activist dies in jail
item.description: The politician was seized by masked men a day before Nicolás Maduro was sworn in for a third term.

item.title: Spanish city 'adopts' migrants who intervened in homophobic attack
item.description: Ibrahima Diack and Magatte N'Diaye are given "adopted sons of the city" status in A Coruña.

item.title: Why is Ukraine negotiating a minerals deal with the US?
item.description: A minister says nearly all key details have been finalised for a deal giving the US access to the country's minerals.

item.title: Uganda probes death of Nigerian footballer in shopping mall
item.description: Abubakar Lawal, 29, reportedly fell from a third-floor balcony of a shopping mall in Kampala.
